name: Somleng
description: An adhearsion application compatible with Twilreapi

AHN_PUNCHBLOCK_USERNAME.description: Required. The punchblock username. If using Rayo with FreeSwitch this should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_PUNCHBLOCK_PASSWORD.description: Required. The punchblock password. If using Rayo with FreeSwitch this should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_PUNCHBLOCK_HOST.description: Required. The punchblock host. If using Rayo with FreeSwitch this should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_PUNCHBLOCK_PLATFORM.description: Required. If using Rayo this should be xmpp

AHN_ADHEARSION_DRB_HOST.description: Required. The hostname of the DRb service

AHN_ADHEARSION_DRB_PORT.description: Required. The port number of the DRb service

AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_METHOD.description: Optional. Make a request to the AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_URL using this HTTP method when a call is completed.

AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_URL.description: Optional. Make a request to this URL when a call is completed.

AHN_TWILIO_VOICE_REQUEST_METHOD.description: Optional. Retrieve and execute the TwiML using this HTTP method. Defaults to POST.

AHN_TWILIO_VOICE_REQUEST_URL.description: Required. Retrieve and execute the TwiML at this URL
